item.title: PHP + Postgress + Node + Docker'
item.description:
üíª “PHP + Postgress + Node + Docker” ‚å®Ô∏è

On this project I created a website with a REST API using PHP for the backend and Node for the frontend üñ•Ô∏è, connected to a PostgreSQL database. Everything had to be containerized with Docker and configured in a single YAML file.

I must say that the last time I used PHP was in college, and that was over 10 years ago üòÖ. I had never used PostgreSQL before, but at least I was familiar with Node. As for Docker, I think I had used it a couple of times out of curiosity.
